text_block_list.text: I was on my way home from an outing with Sakura Bakushin O――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Are you aware, Trainer? Did you know that my rival is coming here, right now?
When I was told that, I thought of the Uma Musume of her generation…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You already know, don't you? Indeed, my rival is――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The fastest king of the sea! The "Sailfish"!!
choice_data_list: I didn't think it was a fish!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The one who commands the land, is me. The one who commands the seas is… that fish, for now.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: However! One day, I will take that name and call myself the fastest on land and sea!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: To master speed is a prerequisite for the strongest Uma Musume and the strongest honor-roll student!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In other words, let's G.O. to the aquarium, which is open to the public for a limited time!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Excuse meeee―!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oops, pardon me! The class president was getting excited just now.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, without further ado, let's find the enemy! Where on earth could he～…Ah.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's a school of sardines! Eating sardines makes you smarter!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ever since I heard that, I've been eating them from head to tail!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Thanks to this, I am very intelligent. The sailfish must be terrified.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And, ohh! Look at that! Swimming over there, that's…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's a "yellowtail", the fish they call the fish of success! Before they grow up, they're called things like "Mejiro" and "Warasa"――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oya? So the McQueens will eventually become "yellowtail" McQueens?
choice_data_list: More than that, we're looking for a sailfish!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's right! It was an elite fish that I couldn't pass up, but nevertheless, how careless of me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: My hunch is that they should be around here somewhere! Let's seeee… the fish in the tank next to――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: "Sailfish"…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haa… haah… that's, a sailfish. Somehow, it looks a bit like me, doesn't it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This… sharp, fast-looking expression… like that……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Sure enough, I still want to compete with you! But, this is a museum, and we can't break the rules…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Kuuuuuu～～! What am I supposed to dooo～～!
choice_data_list: Maybe try something like racing in your brain.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I see… So, you think we should know our rivals and make preparations for a future time?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood! I'll use my sardine-trained brain to uncover the secret to the sailfish's speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hoho… Hoouuuh! Did you see that!? The dorsal fin went swoosh!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I see, I see, I seeeeee! Now I know the whole secret to speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: To sum it up, the trick is to… swoosh the dorsal fin with all your might!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fu-fu-fuu～! This is the result of eating sardines!
I don't know how that would help her without a dorsal fin, but… she seemed satisfied, so it was fine.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Racing, in my brain!? My honors student heart was just completely shocked!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …My brain… in my brain, with the sailfish… a race……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I've been waiting for you… sailfish!

text_block_list.name: Sailfish
text_block_list.text: Oh… You're the fastest Uma Musume on the track, aren't ya? I'm fast and my stamina is craaaazy. You sure you can beat me?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's my line! Watch your back… No, watch your dorsal fin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushinbakushiiii―n!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It was an excellent battle of speed and stamina! I may even want to go as far as to rename myself Mejiro Bakushin O.
I don't know what's going on in her brain, but she seems to have gotten a handle on it…!
